Welcome to this beautiful Encino Park home, close to great restaurants and shopping along Ventura Blvd, and within minutes to Lake Balboa Park and Sports Complex.
You will find the spacious, open floor plan truly inviting that is perfect for spending time with family or for entertaining friends.
The kitchen has stainless steel appliances and plenty of cabinets for you home chefs, and boasts stylish quartz counter tops.
Large family room is flooded with natural light through the large sliding doors leading to your spacious backyard.
The primary suite is a place to rest and recharge with a large bathroom with tub, shower, dual sinks, and barn door.
The walk-in closet has ample space for your wardrobe.
The front bedroom offers versatile space for guests or a home office and there are two additional sizable bedrooms off the hall with good closet space and natural light.
(Property is staged and will be delivered vacant.
Outdoor swing set and play equipment not part of the rent and no longer in the backyard).
Brought to you by Corey Trevor at Los Angeles Area - eXp Realty of California, Inc.
